attributes.action: restrict overtaking of speed limited vehicles at a speed in excess of 50 miles per hour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The above action would immediately stop the practice of one lorry overtaking another at a speed of just half mile faster. This causes frustration and anger for the following traffic now caught up behind.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
